Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage

Class UnlimitedStorage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.storage.UnlimitedStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable, ResourceStash
public class UnlimitedStorage
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceStash, Observable
This class represents a storage for resources with no size limits or checks on addition of resources

      public void removeResource​(ResourceType resource, int quantity) throws NotEnoughResourceException
      Remove a certain amount of the given resource from storage
      Specified by:
      removeResource in interface ResourceStash
      Parameters:
      resource - the resource to be decreased in quantity
      quantity - the amount of resource to remove from the amount stored
      Throws:
      NotEnoughResourceException - - if the given resource is not present in the storage in the amount to be deleted
